game.name: BYE BYE! POLICE!
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound
game.shortDescription: Steal, Escape, and Power Up! "BYE BYE! POLICE!" is a high-octane, first-person heist action game set in a stylized world. Evade the police blockade, cash in your loot, and upgrade your abilities. Master various skills to pull off the ultimate, "smooth" robbery!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Steal, Escape, and Power Up! "BYE BYE! POLICE!" is a high-octane, first-person heist action game set in a stylized world. Evade the police blockade, cash in your loot, and upgrade your abilities. Master various skills to pull off the ultimate, "smooth" robbery!
